channel.title: TheTwoWorlds ~UPDATED~ ~8 December~
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i1365.photobucket.com/albums/r749/dillon_munien1/0kQIzui_zps6b412697.png[/img] [hr] [hr]
[size=24pt][b]Server Updates[/b][/size] [b][size=12pt]Featured Updates[/size][/b] [hr]
[b][size=12pt]Weekly Update[/size][/b] Week 1 [code]December 2 - Started Combat Fixed saving bug Added firemaking base Updated client Fixed crashing bug Added new packet handlers December 3 - Started website Added runecrafting base Added bone burying base Added spawn Added eating/drinking Added magic base December 4 - Added magic base Added Smithing base Added Fishing base Added combat system Fixed skill bugs December 5 - Updated revision to 718, all planned features will still be implemented and made sure to be done! Added in lots of content, please bear with us as we finish the rest. A new to-do list will be made once this one is done! Added in farming, summoning, object teleports, custom login actions, custom bosses, all new ranks and titles, improved skilling system, improved combat. Fixed all matrix bugs. Added in custom quest *To save the world* (Requires a 8 man team to complete = very long quest), added in a boss for the quest. Custom modeled, working on all magic spells including enchantments. Added welcome screen.[/code] [hr]
[b][size=12pt]Daily Updates[/size][/b] [b]December 2[/b] [code]Started Combat Fixed saving bug Added firemaking base Updated client Fixed crashing bug Added new packet handlers [/Code] [b]December 3[/b] [code] Started website Added runecrafting base Added bone burying base Added spawn Added eating/drinking Added magic base [/code] [b]December 4[/b] [code]Added magic base Added Smithing base Added Fishing base Added combat system Fixed skill bugs [/code] [b]December 5[/b] [Code]Updated revision to 718, all planned features will still be implemented and made sure to be done! Added in lots of content, please bear with us as we finish the rest. A new to-do list will be made once this one is done! [/code]
[b]December 8[/b] [Code]Added in farming, summoning, object teleports, custom login actions, custom bosses, all new ranks and titles, improved skilling system, improved combat. Fixed all matrix bugs. Added in custom quest *To save the world* (Requires a 8 man team to complete = very long quest), added in a boss for the quest. Custom modeled, working on all magic spells including enchantments. Added welcome screen.[/code] [hr] [hr]
[b][size=24pt]Introduction[/size][/b] [i]As a intermediate programmer, i have always looked for ways of challenging myself so that i would be able to call myself a rsps programmer. Over the past year i have been studying programming and learning how to become a real programmer. And now with this project i am going to test what i have learned. I have played many servers over the years, some have bored me, some made me quite addicted, but most of them felt the same. With this server i am hoping to create something unique. Something that will hopefully be able to be remembered as a good server.[/i] [hr] [hr]
[size=24pt][b]Developing Team[/b][/size] [b][size=12pt]Programmers[/size][/b] Me [OPEN] [OPEN] [b][size=12pt]Community Manager[/size][/b] nolan2131 [b][size=12pt]GFX Designer[/size][/b] Jyles [b][size=12pt]Site/Server Admins[/size][/b] Hades [OPEN] [b][size=12pt]Server/Server Moderators[/size][/b] [OPEN] [OPEN]
[hr] [hr]
[size=24pt][b]Planned Features[/b][/size] [hr] [hr]
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111124170261/runescape/images/c/c0/Quest.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Extra Features[/b] [/size] [hr] Random Events Multiple Worlds Custom GUI [color=green]Fully Clipped Custom Quests[/color] Falador Drop Party room 100% Functional Dicing 100% Functional Add/Ignore working 100% (No glitchy person is offline when he really isnt stuff)p/color] Working clan chat - With lootshare Clan battles All items are dropable and pickable/buyable - eg making vials by glasspipe and molten glass [hr]
[img]http://static4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121005172651/soulsplit-rsps/images/9/9d/Melee-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Combat[/b][/size] [hr]
Poison Works Dwarf Multicannon 100% Working Hand Cannon All specials attacks doing the correct animations All special attacks doing the right effect (e,g, Dragon battleaxe raising your strength) All correct combat animations All Armour doing the correct effects (Spirit shields e.t.c) Magic spells working All enchanting spells working Magic spells do the correct animation when used Clipped projectiles All range weapons working All special attacks added [hr]
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130723012612/soulsplit-rsps/images/thumb/2/24/Prayer-icon.png/25px-Prayer-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Prayer[/b][/size] [hr]
All prayers give correct effects Correct image above head when activated Bone burying Use on altar (Added in every bone on altar, even the useless ones [hr] [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122191028/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Mining[/b] [/size] [hr] Mining working 100% [color=green]All ores around the world mineable[/color] Rock creatures randomly spawn
[hr]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122232122/runescape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Smithing[/b] [/size] [hr] All bars smithable Amulets and rings making 100% All armour able to be made Superheat 100% Functional [hr]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122200319/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Fletching[/b] [/size] [hr] All bows fletchable Arrow shafts fletchable Use knife on logs working 100% Crossbows able to be made All arrows and bolts able to be made Correct animations for fletching
[hr]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214504/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Firemaking[/b] [/size] [hr] Clipped firemaking All logs able to be burned Fire goes out and turns to ashes
[hr]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122233049/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Cooking[/b] [/size] [hr] [color=green]Able to make pies Able to make cakes Able to make pizza's Able to cook all food (fish) Cooking animations 100% Chefs outfit decreases chance of burning[/colour]
[hr]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122235048/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Herblore[/b] [/size] [hr] All potions makeable All potions effects working 100% Correct potion making animation
[hr]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120123002212/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Fishing[/b] [/size] [hr] All fishs able to be caught Whirlpool has a 5% chance of taking your fishing equipment [color=red]Moving fishing spots[/color] All fishing spots working [color=red]River troll randomly spawns[/color] [color=red]Evil bob randomly spawns[/color] Correct animations
[hr]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122231156/runescape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Crafting[/b] [/size] [hr] [color=green]Able to train crafting by spinning Able to train crafting by making jewelry Able to make pots Leather crafting working 100% All correct animations[/colour]
[hr]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122213351/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Farming[/b] [/size] [hr] Tool storage working Compost working Super compost effect working All patches working across map Master farmer able to store your tools All tools working All animation working
[hr]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214707/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Slayer[/b] [/size] [hr] All slayermasters working Slayer master level requirements Working slayer ring Slayer working 100%
[hr]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122223429/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Runecrafting[/b] [/size] [hr] Essence mines working 100% Pure essence effect working Talismans working 100% Tiara's working 100% All runes can be crafted Correct animations Runes can be combined - eg water and earth to make mud runes
[hr]
[img]http://static4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121005172610/soulsplit-rsps/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Agility[/b] [/size] [hr] Gnome stronghold course working Brimhaven agility arena working Agility pyramid working Barbarian Outpost working Wilderness course working Correct animations
[hr]
[img]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121005172828/soulsplit-rsps/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Woodcutting[/b] [/size] [hr] All trees chopable [color=red]Spirit tree event working[/color] Correct chopping animations
[hr]
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121005172818/soulsplit-rsps/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Thieving[/b] [/size] [hr] Pick pocketing Npc working 100% All proper npc will be able to be pick pocketed All stalls working All thieving chests working [color=red]Picklockable doors working[/color] Correct animations
[hr]
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228042917/2007scape/images/f/f6/Construction_icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Contruction[/b] [/size] [hr] Able to build houses Able to edit houses [color=red]Able to change location of the houses[/color] Able to let other players into your house Correct animations
[hr]
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121005172730/soulsplit-rsps/images/8/83/Hunter-icon.png[/img] [size=18pt][b]Hunter[/b] [/size] [hr]
All hunter animals able to be hunted Tracking working 100% Snares working 100% Traps working 100% Correct animations [hr] [hr]
[b][size=24pt]Images and Videos[/size][/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8mvv8DvyGik&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[hr] [hr]
[b][size=24pt]Community Feedback[/size][/b] [hr] [hr]
[b][size=24pt]Support Us![/size][/b] [hr]
[img]http://i1365.photobucket.com/albums/r749/dillon_munien1/505xfqK_zpsf0054d7f.png[/img] [Code]http://i1365.photobucket.com/albums/r749/dillon_munien1/505xfqK_zpsf0054d7f.png[/Code][/center]

item.title: TheTwoWorlds ~UPDATED~ ~8 December~
item.dc:creator: @Munien Munien
item.description:
@Munien wrote:

[center]

[hr]
[hr]

[size=24pt]Server Updates[/size]
[size=12pt]Featured Updates[/size]
[hr]

[size=12pt]Weekly Update[/size]
Week 1

December 2 - Started Combat Fixed saving bug Added firemaking base Updated client Fixed crashing bug Added new packet handlers December 3 - Started website Added runecrafting base Added bone burying base Added spawn Added eating/drinking Added magic base December 4 - Added magic base Added Smithing base Added Fishing base Added combat system Fixed skill bugs December 5 - Updated revision to 718, all planned features will still be implemented and made sure to be done! Added in lots of content, please bear with us as we finish the rest. A new to-do list will be made once this one is done! Added in farming, summoning, object teleports, custom login actions, custom bosses, all new ranks and titles, improved skilling system, improved combat. Fixed all matrix bugs. Added in custom quest *To save the world* (Requires a 8 man team to complete = very long quest), added in a boss for the quest. Custom modeled, working on all magic spells including enchantments. Added welcome screen.
[hr]

[size=12pt]Daily Updates[/size]
December 2

Started Combat Fixed saving bug Added firemaking base Updated client Fixed crashing bug Added new packet handlers
December 3

Started website
Added runecrafting base
Added bone burying base 
Added spawn
Added eating/drinking
Added magic base

December 4

Added magic base Added Smithing base Added Fishing base Added combat system Fixed skill bugs
December 5

Updated revision to 718, all planned features will still be implemented and made sure to be done! Added in lots of content, please bear with us as we finish the rest. A new to-do list will be made once this one is done!

December 8

Added in farming, summoning, object teleports, custom login actions, custom bosses, all new ranks and titles, improved skilling system, improved combat. Fixed all matrix bugs. Added in custom quest *To save the world* (Requires a 8 man team to complete = very long quest), added in a boss for the quest. Custom modeled, working on all magic spells including enchantments. Added welcome screen.
[hr]
[hr]

[size=24pt]Introduction[/size]
As a intermediate programmer, i have always looked for ways of challenging myself so that i would be able to call myself a rsps programmer. Over the past year i have been studying programming and learning how to become a real programmer. And now with this project i am going to test what i have learned. I have played many servers over the years, some have bored me, some made me quite addicted, but most of them felt the same. With this server i am hoping to create something unique. Something that will hopefully be able to be remembered as a good server.
[hr]
[hr]

[size=24pt]Developing Team[/size]
[size=12pt]Programmers[/size]
Me
[OPEN]
[OPEN]
[size=12pt]Community Manager[/size]
nolan2131
[size=12pt]GFX Designer[/size]
Jyles
[size=12pt]Site/Server Admins[/size]
Hades
[OPEN]
[size=12pt]Server/Server Moderators[/size]
[OPEN]
[OPEN]

[hr]
[hr]

[size=24pt]Planned Features[/size]
[hr]
[hr]

[size=18pt]Extra Features
[/size]
[hr]
Random Events
Multiple Worlds
Custom GUI
[color=green]Fully Clipped
Custom Quests[/color]
Falador Drop Party room 100% Functional
Dicing 100% Functional
Add/Ignore working 100% (No glitchy person is offline when he really isnt stuff)p/color]
Working clan chat - With lootshare
Clan battles
All items are dropable and pickable/buyable - eg making vials by glasspipe and molten glass
[hr]

[size=18pt]Combat[/size]
[hr]

Poison Works
Dwarf Multicannon 100% Working
Hand Cannon
All specials attacks doing the correct animations
All special attacks doing the right effect (e,g, Dragon battleaxe raising your strength)
All correct combat animations
All Armour doing the correct effects (Spirit shields e.t.c)
Magic spells working
All enchanting spells working
Magic spells do the correct animation when used
Clipped projectiles
All range weapons working
All special attacks added
[hr]

[size=18pt]Prayer[/size]
[hr]

All prayers give correct effects
Correct image above head when activated
Bone burying
Use on altar (Added in every bone on altar, even the useless ones
[hr]
[size=18pt]Mining
[/size]
[hr]
Mining working 100%
[color=green]All ores around the world mineable[/color]
Rock creatures randomly spawn

[hr]

[size=18pt]Smithing
[/size]
[hr]
All bars smithable
Amulets and rings making 100%
All armour able to be made
Superheat 100% Functional
[hr]

[size=18pt]Fletching
[/size]
[hr]
All bows fletchable
Arrow shafts fletchable
Use knife on logs working 100%
Crossbows able to be made
All arrows and bolts able to be made
Correct animations for fletching

[hr]

[size=18pt]Firemaking
[/size]
[hr]
Clipped firemaking
All logs able to be burned
Fire goes out and turns to ashes

[hr]

[size=18pt]Cooking
[/size]
[hr]
[color=green]Able to make pies
Able to make cakes
Able to make pizza’s
Able to cook all food (fish)
Cooking animations 100%
Chefs outfit decreases chance of burning[/colour]

[hr]

[size=18pt]Herblore
[/size]
[hr]
All potions makeable
All potions effects working 100%
Correct potion making animation

[hr]

[size=18pt]Fishing
[/size]
[hr]
All fishs able to be caught
Whirlpool has a 5% chance of taking your fishing equipment
[color=red]Moving fishing spots[/color]
All fishing spots working
[color=red]River troll randomly spawns[/color]
[color=red]Evil bob randomly spawns[/color]
Correct animations

[hr]

[size=18pt]Crafting
[/size]
[hr]
[color=green]Able to train crafting by spinning
Able to train crafting by making jewelry
Able to make pots
Leather crafting working 100%
All correct animations[/colour]

[hr]

[size=18pt]Farming
[/size]
[hr]
Tool storage working
Compost working
Super compost effect working
All patches working across map
Master farmer able to store your tools
All tools working
All animation working

[hr]

[size=18pt]Slayer
[/size]
[hr]
All slayermasters working
Slayer master level requirements
Working slayer ring
Slayer working 100%

[hr]

[size=18pt]Runecrafting
[/size]
[hr]
Essence mines working 100%
Pure essence effect working
Talismans working 100%
Tiara’s working 100%
All runes can be crafted
Correct animations
Runes can be combined - eg water and earth to make mud runes

[hr]

[size=18pt]Agility
[/size]
[hr]
Gnome stronghold course working
Brimhaven agility arena working
Agility pyramid working
Barbarian Outpost working
Wilderness course working
Correct animations

[hr]

[size=18pt]Woodcutting
[/size]
[hr]
All trees chopable
[color=red]Spirit tree event working[/color]
Correct chopping animations

[hr]

[size=18pt]Thieving
[/size]
[hr]
Pick pocketing Npc working 100%
All proper npc will be able to be pick pocketed
All stalls working
All thieving chests working
[color=red]Picklockable doors working[/color]
Correct animations

[hr]

[size=18pt]Contruction
[/size]
[hr]
Able to build houses
Able to edit houses
[color=red]Able to change location of the houses[/color]
Able to let other players into your house
Correct animations

[hr]

[size=18pt]Hunter
[/size]
[hr]

All hunter animals able to be hunted
Tracking working 100%
Snares working 100%
Traps working 100%
Correct animations

[hr]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8mvv8DvyGik&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
